author: aelwood
body:
Pull request for the latest AlphaT hlt filter along with the creation of a HLT Validation DQM module for offline validation of the HLT.

To be made in conjunction with a JIRA ticket for modifying the AlphaT HLT paths

This is made on behalf of the SUSY group alphaT analysis.
title: Update to AlphaT HLT filter and DQM module
